ehi sabhapathi kirthi wikramarathna hiru prawruththi anshayata sandahan kale mema sathiyedi me pilibandawa sakachchawakda pawathwena bawayi.pawathina wiyali kalagunaya hethuwen me wanawita dinaka widuli illuma megawot 200 kin pamana ihala gos thibenawa.samanya dineka widuli illuma wanne megawot 2200 k.kese namuth widuli panka saha wayu samikarana bhawithaya ihala yama mema thaththwayata hethuwi athi bawa sunithya balashakthi adhikariye sabhapathi kirthi wikramarathna sandahan kala.mita pera hitapu janadhipathini chandrika bandaranayaka kumaranathunga aandu samayeda  pawathi widuli arbudayata piliyamak lesa sammatha welawa wenas keruna.mewarada mewani yojanawak sidukirimata apeksha karana bawayi sunithya balashakthi adhikariye sabhapathi kirthi wikramarathna sandahan kale.

polisiya samachchalayata lak kirima, polisiyata apahasa kirima, mahajanathawa thula polisiya pilibadawa waradi chithrayak nirmanaya kirima ha polisiyata allas labadima sadaha janathawa pelambaawima yana chodana yatathe owun adhikaranaya wetha idiripath kara rakshitha bandhanagaragatha kirimata da polisiya kriya kaleya.
(eke kisima naraka deyak ehema na harida ) bangaladeshaye githaya nam mata hithata alluwa eeka lassanayi
